content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for your interest in the apartment. The monthly rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate a lower rental price. Can you give me a starting point?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Sure, I would be happy to provide a starting point for negotiations. How about 1,500 Euros per month? This price is competitive in the New York rental market for a 25 square meter apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,500 Euros per month.
TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month, Hassan. I appreciate your business and look forward to working with you in the future. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine
